website_summaries.verdict: Comes with a stretching band with 12 loops, a light level strap, carrying case, and ebook.
pros: Made of high-quality materials, these are excellent for stretching as well as resistance
Also useful for physical therapy and post-workout recovery
cons: Scant instructions on how to access the ebook

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great stretch
customer_reviews.text: This product is made very well. My daughters a figure skater and uses it daily and says she loves it. She’s 12, so it’s nice to have something she can adjust to her length. The colors are bright, and it also comes with the stretchy band, which she uses to help strengthen her outer hips muscles. So far this product has held up very well!! We would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer West

customer_reviews.title: love this product
customer_reviews.text: This strap is awesome. Its made of very high quality material. easy to use. love the bright colors. love that it comes with a small carrying case and an extra small rubber stretching band. this item is very helpful when trying to stretch and go into poses or moves that youve never done before or that your trying to make better. the only thing I didnt like was that the box says includes yoga e-book and video exercises but doesnt give any information on how to access it, but this was corrected once talking with customer service.
customer_reviews.author: william E

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, has helped me improve my flexibility
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality, has helped me improve my flexibility! I do wish there was a little more instructions on the different types of stretches you can do with it other than the obvious ones, however, that is what the internet is for! Great product over all!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori J. Tromble

customer_reviews.title: Too cute for words
customer_reviews.text: I love that it easy to use. I am a semi huge health nut I love that I can do all kind of stretches and fitness position with it. I plan to use when I go back to the gym as a pre warm up. I love also the pamphlet that shows how to use it and the convenient little pouch to put inside of.
customer_reviews.author: Bxmixsiren

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful stretching strap
customer_reviews.text: I recently started physical therapy for scoliosis at a local facility. I wanted my own strap so that I could do exercises at home. The Wind Grace strap is not only effective for home exercises, it is also easy to take in its own carryall when traveling. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PAReader

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy product for therapy and sports training.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for myself for physical therapy, but it’s so great that I’m going to buy one for my granddaughter who is a figure skater. It comes with a cute little pouch and a resistance band too! I highly recommend this product. Great for physical therapy and sports training. My grand daughters used mine to get her foot up high above her head for figure skating moves.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie S Duffy

customer_reviews.title: A must have.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing addition to my Yoga lifestyle! The first thing I did when I received this was to try it out. It allows you to stretch out at your own pace so you don't hurt yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Melz G

customer_reviews.title: Stretching on the go!
customer_reviews.text: We like the ability to work out and stretch when we get the urge, not because we have to, and the yoga strap gives us the opportunity to do just that.
customer_reviews.author: tmwalsh

customer_reviews.title: Good stretching strap
customer_reviews.text: I needed a strap for post knee surgery. This strap is just right and has many handles so you can accommodate any reach.
customer_reviews.author: Castle Falls

customer_reviews.title: Love the pink!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Appears to be of good quality. Material feels similar to that of a car seatbelt. I really like that it comes with a theraband as well, perfect size for legs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very long
customer_reviews.text: A shorter one would be easier for me to handle.
customer_reviews.author: D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Product is exactly like noted.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for stretching effectively. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: High quality easy to grip
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. The strap is thick and wide which makes it comfortable and easy to use. Long length.
customer_reviews.author: PaulaBear66

customer_reviews.title: Best quality strap around
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth it. Read in a day- aesthetician yogi peace love life
customer_reviews.author: VanillaPepper

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing!! It is durable and easy to use!!
customer_reviews.author: Hollie A

customer_reviews.title: Stretching feels great
customer_reviews.text: Works great to stretch out my ITB band. I'm happy I have it. Its helping to save me money from going to PT once a week to continue to work on the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Star M Flanders

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Recovering from broken ankle that required surgery. Fantastic aid to do stretching exercises.
customer_reviews.author: Raindove

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stretching strap, the color is also gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Stroe Annabella

customer_reviews.title: A very good product
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of problems with flexibility and this has helped me improve my flexibility. I wish there was a little more instructions on the different types of ways you can use it other than the ones they show. Super Sturdy and well made. Very good product over all.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Good stretching
customer_reviews.text: Feels good to use the strap and get a better stretch. Definitely very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I bought two one for the gym one for home, loops are very helpful for stretches, great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie T.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. They replaced the damaged one and sent a new one.
customer_reviews.author: VAllen

customer_reviews.title: Great quality especially at this price.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality even if it were more expensive. Came with a bonus elastic band also.
customer_reviews.author: Darrin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this strap. Great quality, sturdy and the color so pretty. I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what i was looking for. Perfect! Would deff buy from this seller again. Thabk you!
customer_reviews.author: wickedlovely

customer_reviews.title: Love This!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! Exactly what I was looking for!! Very Sturdy and well made:)
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big girl and I love the foot holes. It helps me get a good stretch
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stretch It Out.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item. The length is long enough to do all types of exercises with.
customer_reviews.author: teresa pratt

customer_reviews.title: Stretching strap
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product. Although it did not come with a video???
customer_reviews.author: Diamond Camp

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: So glad I purchased this item - it has revolutionized stretching for me!
customer_reviews.author: Reghan Turgeon

customer_reviews.title: Planning to buy a second of these!
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured. Great buy and nice quality. I plan to buy a second one for even more stretching options.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love how this strap allows me to deepen my stretches and yoga practice all together. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool on my year long adventure of stretching my body. It showed me just how out of shape I was but it gives me the ability to challenge myself to greater.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Ajah

customer_reviews.title: Good length nice size loops.
customer_reviews.text: This strap is great for stretching, the loops are nice size unlike some straps that the loops are too small. Length is long enough for its intended use.
customer_reviews.author: D.C.

product_meta.title: Windgrace Premium Stretching Strap | Quality Physical Therapy Strap with 12 Loops - eBook, Resistance Loop Band and Carry Bag - Physical Therapy, Yoga, Pilates, Yoga Stretch Strap
product_meta.description: What’s in the Box? When your Amazon box arrives at your door, open it and you will be halfway there to the best version of yourself thanks to: 1x stretching strap with loops (8 ft.x1.5'') 1x natural latex band light level (23.6‶x1.9‶) Multi-Loop Stretching Strap If you want to tone your body up or increase your flexibility this Windgrace stretching strap is the right tool for you, your body and your fitness goals. Made from non-slip nylon for optimal stability, it features an impressive number of 12 loops for an adjustable and customizable experience and: Allows you to gradually increase the difficulty Is suitable for both beginners and advanced users Improves your range of motion and balance Has a smooth texture that’s gentle on your skin Features soft handles that won’t hurt your hands Exercise Band Whether you want to recover mobility or to develop leaner muscles, Windgrace stretching strap is here to help you! Made from TPE-free latex, the exercise loop band is completely safe for your health and: Won’t snap during workouts Helps you lose weight and shape your body Is suitable for both fitness and physical therapy Can be taken with you for on-the-go training Is snap, stretch and sweat resistant Multiuse Flexibility Bands Consisting of one yoga stretching strap with loops and one resistance band, your Windgrace Bands can be used to stretch all muscle groups being a complete stretching equipment. Excellent as a stretch strap, a yoga stretch strap, an exercise strap, but even for Pilates and Ballet as it is a versatile fitness band. They are great as physical therapy stretching band for recovery and rehabilitation too
feature_bullets: 🇺🇸MADE FOR USA – It doesn’t matter if you want to use your stretching strap as a yoga stretch strap to boost your flexibility, an exercise band strap to increase your strength or you want to rely on the stretching strap as a more gentle and caring therapy strap or leg stretch strap. Windgrace stretching strap with loops is adjustable and easily customizable for every use allowing you to gradually increase the difficulty level of your stretches and exercises.

✅ GENTLE ON YOUR SKIN – Comparing Windgrace stretching straps to other stretch band strap you would see amazing difference as, Windgrace really want to take care of you, of your body, your safety and health too. Featuring soft neoprene handles and a smooth surface, this stretching band feels soft and gentle on your skin, causing no rubbing or irritation for a safer and more comfortable fitness and stretching experience.

✅ LONG LASTING STRAP – If you’re looking for a quality product you can use and stress over time without tearing apart or ruin while using it Windgrace stretching strap with loops is exactly what you need to add to your fitness or stretch routine - Made from LONG-LASTING NYLON, NON-ELASTIC material, the stretching strap offers optimal resistance and great stability, never losing its shape. A little investment for your future fitness adventures.

✅ PREMIUM BUNDLE AND STARTER KITS – Once you buy your yoga strap stretching, you won’t have to stroll around looking for info about how to use it and what kind of exercises you can try as you will also receive and YOGA SUPREME GUIDE eBook, poses Booklet, a short training video to get you started. In the packing box, you will also find a RESISTANCE BAND and a nice carry bag. There is one more surprise for you: your stretching bands come safely wrapped in a beautiful gift box!

💖SATISFACTION GUARANTEED – Windgrace exercise stretch bands are meant to provide you a perfect training experience becoming the foundation of your stretching equipment. In the unlikely case that your exercise stretching strap doesn’t suit you and your expectations, just send it back for a full refund!
